item.title: Visualizing Deep Neural Networks via Mutual Information
item.description: This is a presentation about the article on “Opening the black box of Deep Neural Networks via Information” by Tishby and Schwartz-Ziv (2017).The Information Bottleneck Definition of Mutual Information: $$ I(X, Y) = \sum_{x, y} p(x, y)\text{log}\frac{p(x,y)}{p(x)p(y)} $$ Properties of MI: $$ I(X, Y) = H(X) - H(X \mid Y) $$ We can also write the conditional entropy on the RHS as: $$ H(X | Y) = \mathbb{E}_y [H(X | y)].
